OUTLINE : Patients complete questionnaire baseline ass demographic , medical history , smoke history , menopausal status , estrogen therapy , diet . Patients undergo low-dose compute tomography ( CT ) scan without contrast . Patients normal CT result undergo additional CT scan every 12 month . Patients abnormal CT result undergo diagnostic CT scan ( absence prior study ) . Patients indeterminate nodule ( less 5 mm size ) undergo surveillance CT study within 3-4 month . If nodule remain unchanged size , patient undergo additional surveillance CT study 6 month 1 year . Patients lung parenchymal abnormality CT suspicious malignancy undergo bronchoscopy biopsy bronchoalveolar lavage ( BAL ) . Patients abnormal CT scan ( ) negative BAL p53 and/or K-ras mutation normal histology positive BAL K-ras and/or p53 mutation undergo additional CT scan 6 month 1 year . Patients biopsy-proven malignancy bronchoscopy refer definitive treatment . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 500 patient accrue study .
